reviews.review: Hands down the best movie I have ever seen.  Honestly.
Thanos was a three-dimensional villain and multiple layers were shown with him and his development. He makes this movies top-tier and definitely the best of the Avengers installments.

I would call this worth sitting through the credits of half the movies in the MCU for the 30 seconds of hype. I was relieved that the movie actually accomplished a fairly seamless intergration of the existing threads. By the end the viewer forgets the absurdity of the magnitude of backstories and personalities in this movie and is left enjoying a well executed project that earned its place in history.

The MCU asks that you leave your smugness at the door and just accept that they've accomplished something incredible. If you can do that, this film will not disappoint.
another dull Marvel movie. Went to see it because my friends wanted to go. Could barely stay awake during it. This might entertain small babies.

One of the best (if not THE best) Marvel movies I’ve seen! Only have a few knit picks without getting too much in to spoilers. First: I wish they went deeper into Thanos’ justification for wanting half the universe destroyed. Second: there were many opportunities where Thanos could’ve just killed many of the Avengers but didn’t. Seemed like a bit of a cop out to bring the heroes face to face with death only to be spared.
No soy fanático de las películas de superhéroes, pero después de ir a ver esta pelicula con mis hijos, quede fascinado con esta película. Me  encanto!!!

Best Marvel movie so far. Funny, action packed, and very emotional. Thanks the main villain steals the show and shows he's not messing around and shows he is the greatest villain marvel have put out thus far. Avengers Infinity War is a must see, please go and watch this film it is amazing.
Everything in this movie was amazing. Exceeded my expectations.
The best avengers film since Assemble, Would have been 5 Starts if it wasn't for some shoddy CGI, I expect so much more for a film the cost half a billion to make.
